name: hdb-resale
description: My Web Visualization Project (rewritten in React)

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-server && npm run build-js
scripts.docker-build: npm run build && docker build -t yongjun21/hdb-resale:latest .
scripts.iron-build: npm run build-server && docker build -f server_src/worker/Dockerfile -t yongjun21/hdb-resale-worker:latest .
scripts.iron-test: npm run iron-test-A && npm run iron-test-B && npm run iron-test-C
scripts.iron-test-A: docker run --rm -a stdout --env-file env.list yongjun21/hdb-resale-worker:latest node worker/timeSeries.js
scripts.iron-test-B: docker run --rm -a stdout --env-file env.list yongjun21/hdb-resale-worker:latest node worker/heatmap.js
scripts.iron-test-C: docker run --rm -a stdout --env-file env.list yongjun21/hdb-resale-worker:latest node worker/private.js
scripts.iron-push: docker push yongjun21/hdb-resale-worker:latest && iron register yongjun21/hdb-resale-worker:latest
scripts.iron-upload: npm run iron-upload-A & npm run iron-upload-B & npm run iron-upload-C
scripts.iron-upload-A: iron worker upload -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL --name time_series yongjun21/hdb-resale-worker node worker/timeSeries.js
scripts.iron-upload-B: iron worker upload -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL -e GOOGLEMAPS_SERVER_KEY=$GOOGLEMAPS_SERVER_KEY --name heatmap yongjun21/hdb-resale-worker node worker/heatmap.js
scripts.iron-upload-C: iron worker upload -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL -e URASPACE_ACCESS_KEY=$URASPACE_ACCESS_KEY --name private yongjun21/hdb-resale-worker node worker/private.js

author: Yong Jun
